properties.description: Please input a folder path as the parameter for this pipeline, and the pipeline will delete files which were last modified more than 30 days ago under the particular folder path.
Connect to your storage store to delete files.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> productcategory
product, productcategory join(product@ProductCategoryID == productcategory@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinProduct
JoinProduct sort(desc(ProductModelID, true)) ~> SortJoin
SortJoin filter(StandardCost > 1000) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbNailPhoto,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		ModifiedDate = product@ModifiedDate,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		PC_Name = productcategory@Name,
		PC_ModifiedDate = productcategory@ModifiedDate
	)) ~> ProductCategorySink
Filter1 sink(input(
		Id as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		LastPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as double,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		PC_Name as string,
		PC_ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = product@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		LastPrice = ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = product@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName,
		ModifiedDate = product@ModifiedDate,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		PC_Name = productcategory@Name,
		PC_ModifiedDate = productcategory@ModifiedDate
	)) ~> SinkToSQL
